meeting_info.organization: City Council Ad Hoc Committee on Pensions
meeting_info.location: City Council Chambers, Floor 6 at City Hall, Dallas, Texas

agenda_items.title: Approval of the April 11, 2024 Ad Hoc Committee on Pensions Meeting Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes from the previous meeting.

agenda_items.title: Pension Plan Cost of Living Adjustment (COLA) Discussion
agenda_items.description: Discussion regarding the cost of living adjustment for the pension plan.
agenda_items.presenter: Jeannie Chen and Joe Kropiewnicki of Deloitte Consulting LLP

agenda_items.title: Employee Retirement Fund (ERF): Funding Soundness Restoration Plan Update and Consideration of Recommendations
agenda_items.description: Update on the funding soundness restoration plan for the Employee Retirement Fund and consideration of recommendations.
agenda_items.presenter: Cheryl Alston, Executive Director, David Etheridge, Deputy Executive Director of the Dallas Employees’ Retirement Fund

agenda_items.title: Dallas Police and Fire Pension System (DPFP): Funding Soundness Restoration Plan Update and Consideration of Recommendations
agenda_items.description: Update on the funding soundness restoration plan for the Dallas Police and Fire Pension System and consideration of recommendations.
agenda_items.presenter: Jack Ireland, Chief Financial Officer, City Manager’s Office

keywords: Dallas Police and Fire Pension System
